name: full-stack-web-project
description:
E-Commerce Application - Corner Market
This is a simple e-commerce platform that allows users to browse and purchase various fresh products such as fruits, vegetables, fish, meat, dairy and more. Users can view categories of products, access discounts and offers, add items to the cart, and proceed to checkout.

scripts.start:client: cd client && npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.start:server: cd server && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node index.js
scripts.dev:server: cd server && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --watch index.js

author: Anis Mhamid
